statements: SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM weather_data;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation > 0 ORDER BY temperature ASC, humidity DESC;
SELECT date, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM weather_data GROUP BY date HAVING AVG(temperature) > 20;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 20 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation > 0.5 ORDER BY humidity ASC;
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 40 AND precipitation < 0.2;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp FROM weather_data;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT id, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 70;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation ORDER BY rotation_order DESC;
SELECT field_name, crop_name FROM crop_rotation WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, crop_name, field_name, rotation_order FROM crop_rotation WHERE crop_name='Corn' AND rotation_order=1 ORDER BY field_name ASC
SELECT id, date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 30 AND temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY temperature, date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 20 OR humidity > 50 ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT id, crop_name, field_name, rotation_order FROM crop_rotation WHERE rotation_order BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY rotation_order
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM crop_data ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM crop_data WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT field_id, crop_id, rotation_order FROM field_rotation ORDER BY rotation_order ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT w.date, w.temperature, c.crop_name FROM weather_data w INNER JOIN crop_data c ON w.date = c.planting_date;
SELECT DISTINCT f.field_id, c.crop_name FROM field_rotation f JOIN crop_data c ON f.crop_id = c.crop_id ORDER BY f.rotation_order ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MAX(precipitation) AS max_precip FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM crop_data WHERE crop_name LIKE 'Corn%' ORDER BY planting_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM crop_data WHERE planting_season = 'Spring';
SELECT field_name, field_size, soil_type FROM field_data ORDER BY field_size ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM rotation_plan WHERE rotation_order BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25.0 ORDER BY date;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT crop_name, planting_season, field_name FROM crop_data JOIN rotation_plan ON crop_data.id = rotation_plan.crop_id JOIN field_data ON field_data.id = rotation_plan.field_id WHERE field_size > 10 ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp FROM weather_data;
SELECT field_name, AVG(field_size) AS avg_size FROM field_data GROUP BY field_name HAVING avg_size > 5 ORDER BY avg_size DESC;

SELECT crop_name, COUNT(crop_id) AS total_rotations FROM crop_data JOIN rotation_plan ON crop_data.id = rotation_plan.crop_id GROUP BY crop_name HAVING total_rotations > 2 ORDER BY total_rotations DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData;
SELECT date, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity > 70;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM CropData ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT field_name, location FROM FieldData WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM RotationPlan WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM CropData WHERE crop_type='Fruit' ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT field_name, location FROM FieldData WHERE location='California' AND field_name LIKE 'Farm%' ORDER BY field_name;
SELECT plan_id, start_date, end_date FROM RotationPlan WHERE crop_id IN (SELECT crop_id FROM CropData WHERE crop_type='Vegetable') ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT field_id, recommended_crop_id, recommended_date FROM CropRecommendation WHERE field_id=1 AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM recommended_date) = 6 ORDER BY recommended_date DESC LIMIT 5;
